TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UseManagedPresentationBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension

Docs.summary: A binding element used to communicate with a [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)] Security Token Service that supports the [!INCLUDE[infocard1](~/add/includes/infocard1-md.md)] profile of WS-Trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used by an identity provider to express in its policy the fact that it supports the [!INCLUDE[infocard1](~/add/includes/infocard1-md.md)] profile of WS-Trust. Identity providers that publish such a policy assertion should be able to issue tokens based on that [!INCLUDE[infocard1](~/add/includes/infocard1-md.md)] profile.

Docs.param: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.
The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
Docs.summary: Exports custom policy assertions in the binding element into the WSDL information.
